settings.heading: Where do you ship from?
settings.row_content: My little studio is based in Cavite, Philippines. All orders are shipped out from Cavite. :))

settings.heading: Do you ship to my country?
settings.row_content: We ship around the world but due to the COVID-19 pandemic our local post office have a limited list of countries they can ship to. Click here to see the list of countries eligible for shipping.

settings.heading: When will you ship out my order?
settings.row_content: Order processing time is 3-10 days unless stated otherwise (or may take longer during sale or holiday). We will send you an email notification along with the tracking info once your order is shipped out.

settings.heading: Where can I track my order?
settings.row_content:
You will receive order tracking via email once we ship it out.

Please wait for 1-7 business days for your tracking to work. You can check the status of your order using PHLPost Tracking or 17Track.

settings.heading: What is the status of my order?
settings.row_content:
You can check your order status in your account’s order history page.

You can also check the shipping status of your order using PHLPost Tracking or 17Track.

Shipping (transit) could take up to 3-9 weeks.

settings.heading: Can I change my shipping address?
settings.row_content:
Please contact us immediately so we can edit it and deliver your order to your preferred address. Once your order is shipped out, we won’t be able to change it. 

Also, we are not responsible on refunding shipping cost for orders with incomplete or wrong address. Please check your address before placing an order.

settings.heading: Why is my order delivery taking so long to deliver?
settings.row_content:
Due to COVID-19 restrictions there will be delays on the shipment of orders.

I'm not responsible for missing or delays incurred by the shipping service and orders held by your local customs office.

settings.heading: Do you accept returns or exchange?
settings.row_content:
All sales are final. We are currently not accepting returns or exchange unless you receive a damaged package.

Please contact us here or email us at shandstudioph@gmail.com with the photo of your damaged order as soon as you received it.
